The Ministry of Health: s press release and tweet confirmed that the viral document offering "clarification regarding the declaration of holidays for the states - Maharashtra, Gujarat, Uttar Pradesh, and Sikkim" is false.
The press release posted by the Press In: PIB) Delhi on March 13, 2020, stated that a fake O.M. (Official Memorandum) from the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare was circulating, and it clarified that the mentioned O.M. is fake and not issued by the ministry.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, received several requests to fact-check the image on WhatsApp and their official Android application.
